description:
My name is Garbage...

***

Written by: HumboldtLycanthrope

Content warning: incest, sexual abuse

***

Bonus: "My husband keeps asking the same question over and over and it's driving me up a wall" Written by:  Lighting Nations (reddit.com/r/thoughtindustry) and Narrated by: Danielle Hewitt

***

Find our reward tiers and how to get your bonus magnet at patreon.com/creepypod

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod
